title: Stories by Voltage Finance on Medium
description: Stories by Voltage Finance on Medium

items.title: Voltage Finance Integrates MERKL for Boosted Rewards on V3 Pools
items.content_html:
Voltage Finance is thrilled to announce the integration of MERKL within our DEX UI, introducing a new “Boosted Reward” tab on the Pools page. This feature offers users an enhanced opportunity to earn additional rewards by providing liquidity to specific v3 pools, significantly improving the user experience and incentivizing participation.

Here is how you will Benefit

By participating in the boosted pools, users can earn trading fees along with additional rewards. This dual incentive structure ensures that liquidity providers are well-compensated for their participation. The added rewards come from Voltage’s collaboration with MERKL, designed to enhance the overall profitability of providing liquidity.

The integration simplifies the process of adding liquidity. Users can now directly provide liquidity to boosted pools on Voltage’s user-friendly interface. This seamless integration means users will not need to navigate multiple platforms to maximize your earnings.

Here is how you can get started on Voltage’s Boosted v3 Pools

  1. Navigate to the Pool page: navigate to the Earn tab and click on the “Pools” button to view all available liquidity pools.
  2. Identify Boosted Pools: Look for pools marked with a small green Voltage logo, indicating they are part of the boosted rewards program and connect your wallet (hover the mouse over the lighting there is a message of boosted rewards).

Providing Liquidity:

  1. Select a Pool: Choose from the available boosted pools, which are currently offering enhanced rewards.
  2. Add Liquidity: Follow the on-screen instructions to add your liquidity to the selected pool. Ensure you have the necessary tokens in your wallet.
  3. Confirm Transaction: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to start providing liquidity and earning rewards.

Voltage Finance - How to provide liquidity to v3 pools

Managing Rewards:

  1. View Positions: To see your active positions, click on the “Boosted Pools” tab on the Pool page.

2. Claim Rewards: Click on the “Claim Rewards” button to transfer your earnings to your wallet. If you provide liquidity to multiple boosted pools, it will claim all accrued rewards on all of them automatically.

Note 1: You have to claim rewards from accrued trading fees on the v3 pool separately on the pool page.
Note 2: Although a campaign ended, it might take a few hours to claim the rewards because MERKL updates their script every 8 hours.

Celebrating this new integration with the first boosted campaign

We are excited to launch a new campaign featuring three v3 pools, offering boosted rewards for a limited time. A total of $1000 worth of FUSE will be divided equally over the following four pools from Monday, 2nd July to 8th July. The pools included are:

  • asUSDC-USDC
  • USDC v2-USDT v2
  • FUSE-sFUSE
  • WFUSE-VOLT

Involving the DAO in the Liquidity Incentives Distribution

In the near future, VOLT stakers (veVOLT holders) will be able to vote on proposals to decide which pools and tokens should receive additional incentives, fostering a more engaged and dynamic ecosystem. This initiative aims to give our community a significant role in shaping the future of Voltage Finance and reward our most loyal liquidity providers.

The integration of MERKL into Voltage Finance marks a significant milestone in our journey to enhance user experience and increase participation. By providing seamless access to boosted rewards, we are offering our users an opportunity to maximize their earnings while actively participating in the growth of our ecosystem.
Join us in this exciting new phase and take advantage of the boosted rewards today!

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Voltage Finance Monthly Update — June 2024
items.content_html:
Voltage Finance Monthly Update — June 2024

Development Updates on the DApp Over the Past Month

The Voltage team has been hard at work with several exciting updates and improvements this month:

  • Token Addition: Introduced support for the MATIC token.
  • Bug Fixes: Resolved issues with adding and adjusting liquidity.
  • Mobile Optimization: Enhanced the swap page for mobile devices.
  • Integration: Set up Merkl integration.
  • Error Reporting: Implemented Sentry for error tracking.
  • Testing: Conducted integration testing for the Voltage web app.
  • Component Stability: Fixed a bug causing components to refresh unexpectedly.
  • Subgraph Upgrade: Upgraded subgraphs to utilize the Graph decentralized service.
  • Router Fix: Addressed a BNB swap issue in the router.

BNB v2 and New v3 Pools

We introduced the BNB v2 as the new standard on Voltage, urging all users to migrate their liquidity to BNB v2. Here is a tutorial to migrate BNB to BNB v2 in a few steps.

Following up on that we introduced new v3 pools and farms to provide greater liquidity options and trading pairs:

  • WFUSE-BNB v2 (Pool)
  • BNB v2-WETH v2 (Pool)
  • BNB-fUSD v3 (Pool & Farm)

Notable Data-Driven Milestone

We are thrilled to announce that Voltage has surpassed an all-time high of $4.9 million in trading volume this month! This marks a 36.5% increase from last month’s $3.5 million, a 362.3% rise from April, and a staggering 734.3% increase from March.

This Month’s Highlights

MATIC Token Listing

You can now bridge MATIC to FUSE and start trading & providing liquidity in the new WFUSE/MATIC v3 pool on Voltage DEX.

A new layer of DeFI utility for sFUSE on Shoebill

sFUSE is now listed on Shoebill Finance, offering new DeFi lending opportunities. You can deposit $sFUSE as collateral, borrow $FUSE, stake borrowed FUSE to get sFUSE, and repeat to maximize your earnings.

VOLT is now Listed on Lynx Finance!

We are excited to share that after $sFUSE, $VOLT is now available as collateral on Lynx Finance, adding new utility to our ecosystem token. You can now deposit $VOLT on Lynx Finance, trade with leverage, and earn by providing liquidity.

VOLT App Quests on Fuse’s Airdrop

2.5M FUSE Airdrop Season 2 is live with new tasks on the VOLT App. Complete tasks, earn points, and maximize your rewards!

New Tasks:

  • Explore the VOLT App (200 points)
  • Buy $10 of USDC (500 points)
  • Stake FUSE (2 points) per $1 staked daily

v3 Fee Distribution & Burning Report: Record-Breaking Growth in June

Our ecosystem has achieved a remarkable milestone this June with an all-time high trading volume, resulting in unprecedented activity and growth. Here’s a detailed look at the significant impact:

An astounding 27,219,995 VOLT tokens were burned and 12M were distributed to veOLT holders, totaling $2507 worth of VOLT burned and $1105 to veVOLT holders at the current market price. This represents a 118% increase compared to May’s.
The burning process encompassed transactions on v2, fUSD, minting/redeeming, and fuse staking, showcasing the robustness and expansion of our ecosystem.

This record-breaking growth in trading volume and the corresponding fee burning and distribution is a testament to the accelerating momentum and strength of our ecosystem.

Burn Address: You can view the burn address here

Upcoming Things To Look Forward To

Boosted rewards to v3 Liquidity Providers

Voltage Finance is working on integrating MERKL within our DEX UI, introducing a new “Boosted Reward” tab on the Pools page. This feature will enhance rewards for providing liquidity to specific v3 pools and will allow veVOLT holders to vote on proposals for additional incentives.

New FUSE Staking Page UI

We are excited to launch our updated FUSE staking page with a sleek, user-friendly interface soon. This update will consolidate all sFUSE utilities across various DeFi protocols on the Fuse network and enhance user experience.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to innovate and expand the Voltage Finance ecosystem!

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Announcing the Listing of sFUSE on Shoebill Finance: Unlock New Lending Opportunities
items.content_html:
sFUSE, the liquid staking token of the Fuse network, is now listed on Shoebill Finance! This listing marks another significant milestone for the Fuse and Voltage ecosystems, providing users with even more ways to leverage their FUSE to unlock new earning opportunities. Let’s dive into the details of this exciting development and explore how you can maximize your returns using sFUSE on Shoebill Finance.

Leveraging sFUSE on Shoebill Finance

With the listing of sFUSE on Shoebill Finance, users can now deposit sFUSE as collateral to borrow other assets. This integration provides liquidity without sacrificing your staking income, enabling you to maximize your earnings through strategic borrowing and lending.

Getting Started

1)Deposit sFUSE as Collateral:

  • Connect your wallet to Shoebill Finance.
  • Navigate to the “Lending” section.
  • Select “Supply” and deposit your sFUSE tokens.
  • Confirm the transaction to use sFUSE as collateral.

2) Borrow FUSE:

  • After depositing sFUSE, navigate to the “Borrow” section.
  • Enter the desired FUSE amount you wish to borrow and confirm the transaction.

3) Stake Borrowed FUSE on Voltage Finance:

  • Stake the borrowed FUSE on Voltage Finance to receive more sFUSE.
  • Navigate to the “Earn” section on Voltage Finance and select the staking option.
  • Enter the amount of FUSE to stake and confirm the transaction.
You can repeat the borrowing and staking process to multiply your returns but be aware of the risks involved.
Shoebill users will earn FUSE rewards by lending sFUSE and borrowing FUSE, as well as by participating in an upcoming Galxe community campaign that includes various social and on-chain tasks.
Additionally, users will also accumulate points from both Fuse and Shoebill airdrops.

Get Started today!

To start leveraging sFUSE on Shoebill Finance, simply follow the steps outlined above. Ensure your wallet is connected, and you have sufficient sFUSE to use as collateral.

This new integration is a testament to the growing utility of sFUSE within the Fuse ecosystem, offering users even more ways to maximize their returns.

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: 2.5M FUSE Airdrop Season 2 Introduced New Tasks on the VOLT App!
items.content_html:
What’s New in Season 2?

Following the success of Season 1, Fuse Network has extended its Airdrop and introduced Season 2 with fresh, engaging tasks to help you earn even more rewards. Here’s what you can look forward to with Voltage.

We are thrilled to announce that Voltage’s VOLT Mobile App is now featured in the FUSE Airdrop Season 2 with engaging new tasks!

What is the VOLT App?

Our native smart wallet app is designed to streamline and elevate your DeFi experience within the Fuse ecosystem. By consolidating buying crypto, swapping, staking, and liquidity providing into a single, user-friendly interface, the VOLT App aims to make DeFi more accessible, efficient, and secure for all users.

New Tasks to complete on the VOLT App

1. Explore the VOLT App

Completing this task will earn you 200 points on the Fuse Airdrop!

Starting your journey with a secure wallet on the VOLT App ensures that your funds are stored securely while providing easy access to all Voltage DEX features within a single app. Only participants with a VOLT App wallet can join the following tasks and earn points.

2. Buy 10$ of USDC on the VOLT App

Completing this task will earn you 500 points on the Fuse Airdrop!

Seamlessly funding your wallet allows you to participate in the Fuse DeFi ecosystem. Buy 10 USDC on the VOLT App with a few clicks through our on-ramp, which feature multiple payment methods for your convenience.

  1. Open the VOLT App and navigate to the “Buy” button on the home page.
  2. Select USDC and input the amount you wish to buy (minimum 10 USDC to be eligible for the verification of the task).
  3. Follow the prompts to complete your transaction.

3. Stake FUSE on the VOLT App

Completing this task will earn you 2 points per $1 staked every day.

Staking not only secures the network but also provides you with additional rewards. By staking, you earn rewards in the form of additional tokens, contribute to network security, and can compound your holdings over time.
Navigate to the “Earn” tab in the VOLT App anf choose FUSE

  1. Clicking will open a web view of the Voltage DEX
  2. Select the amount you want to stake.
  3. Confirm and complete the staking transaction.
  4. You will be able to see and monitor your staked tokens and rewards on the App

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Celebrating the newly added $BNB and $MATIC pools with a Voltage v3 Tour Campaign
items.content_html:
To provide exciting Defi opportunities for our users and promote cross-chain interoperability, we recently added BNBv2 and MATIC token to the Fuse bridge and also launched new v3 pools on Voltage DEX.
You can get started by watching this video tutorial to how to bridge to Fuse Network. Familiar with the bridging process? Then proceed to bridge BNB and MATIC token using the Fuse bridge to take advantage of our reward offering.

For users still holding the old BNB token on Voltage DEX, you can easily swap the old BNB to the new BNBv2 by following the guideline here. This is to enable our users to start providing liquidity in the newly launched v3 pool and keep enjoying great rewards.

To celebrate the launch of BNBv2 and MATIC on Voltage, we partnered with intract to launch an exciting v3 Tour campaign that offers great reward for active users of our community to participate. Running from June 17 to July 1st, participants can complete a series of tasks ranging from social media engagement to swaps, staking and liquidity provision on Voltage DEX.

With a $1,900 reward pool in $FUSE, this is a fantastic opportunity to explore Voltage and earn rewards.

How to join the Voltage v3 Tour Campaign on Intract

With a trading capital ranging from $50 to $500, participants can start showcasing their trading skills and compete against fellow traders by engaging in these listed tasks to earn XPs and rewards.

  • Bridging of assets
  • Swaps
  • Liquidity provision (See Video tutorial on how to provide liquidity to v3 pools)

The Voltage v3 Tour campaign is designed to cater for all participants that are eager to explore some of the opportunities that Voltage bring to web3 and to the Fuse Defi ecosystem as well as enable them to utilize the functionalities of Intract in rewarding active participation.

Participants should only engage with the following pairs, available on v3 pools, to maximize their chances of winning:

  • WFUSE-BNB v2
  • WFUSE — MATIC v3
  • BNB v2/WETH v2
  • BNB v2/fUSD v3

Reward Allocation

To ensure that community members are adequately rewarded for their participation, we have allocated a generous budget of 41.2K $WFUSE ($1,900), distributed to top 40 participants in the following manner:

  • The top 20 participants (with the most XP points) will share about 21.7K $FUSE
  • The top 21–40 participants will share about 19.5K $FUSE

There will be a public leaderboard on Intract for everyone to be able to track ranking throughout the campaign.

Important Notices

We would like to remind users that to qualify for rewards, liquidity provided must be kept in the pools until the end of the campaign, and participants are encouraged to complete as many tasks as possible to maximize their chances of winning.

Stay Engaged!

Throughout the campaign, we will provide regular updates and reminders to keep you on track. Follow us on Twitter and join our Telegram group and Discord channel for the latest news and support.

Let’s trade, earn, and grow together!

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: New Listings on Voltage: introducing BNB v2 & MATIC
items.content_html:
Voltage Finance is thrilled to announce the listing of two new tokens, BNB v2 and MATIC, on our decentralized exchange (DEX). These tokens are now available on the Fuse bridge. With this addition, we are also launching new v3 pools and farms, enhancing our ecosystem and offering more opportunities for our users.

New v3 Pools and Farms

To provide our community with greater liquidity options and trading pairs, we are introducing the following new v3 pools and farms:

  • WFUSE-BNB v2 (Pool)
  • BNB v2-WETHV2 (Pool)
  • BNB-fUSDV3 (Pool & Farm)
  • WFUSE-MATIC (Pool)

For a detailed tutorial on how to provide liquidity to v3, please see the following tutorial:

Voltage Finance - How to provide liquidity to v3 pools

Migration to BNB v2

As BNB v2 becomes the new standard on Voltage, we invite all users to migrate their liquidity to BNB v2. Here are the steps to ensure a smooth transition:

  1. Withdraw Liquidity from v2 Pool: Remove your existing BNB liquidity from the v2 pools.
  2. Swap BNB for BNB v2: Use the Voltage Swap page to exchange your BNB to BNB v2.
  3. Add Liquidity to v3 Pool: Deposit WFUSE and BNB v2 tokens into the new v3 pool.

Here is a step-by-step tutorial to help you:

interactive demo - Voltage.finance

Get started today!

We appreciate your continued support and look forward to seeing you take advantage of these new opportunities on Voltage Finance.

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Introducing the New Layer of Utility for $VOLT: Collateral on Lynx Finance
items.content_html:
Voltage Finance is thrilled to announce the listing of $VOLT as a collateral asset on Lynx Finance. This collaboration significantly enhances the utility of $VOLT, diversifying its applications and offering new opportunities for holders and users within the ecosystem.

New Collateral Opportunities with $VOLT on Lynx

$VOLT, our native token, is already known for its central role in governance, staking, and rewarding long-term holders. With this new integration, $VOLT enters an exciting new phase of utility. Users can now deposit $VOLT on Lynx Finance, gaining access to 100x leverage on BTC/USD, ETH/USD, and other tradeable instruments on Fuse, but also liquidity provision, thus expanding the token’s functionality.

How to Leverage $VOLT on Lynx Finance

For users eager to take advantage of this new feature, the process is straightforward:

  1. Bridge Funds to Fuse: New users to the Fuse ecosystem will need to bridge their existing funds to the Fuse network.
  2. Acquire $VOLT on Voltage: Use Voltage Finance’s DEX or a CEX to acquire $VOLT tokens. Read how here.
  3. Deposit $VOLT on Lynx: With $VOLT in your wallet, proceed to Lynx Finance where you can deposit your tokens in the ‘Liquidity’ tab and begin leveraging them as collateral for trading or liquidity provision.

This enhanced functionality opens up several new avenues:

  • Trade Perpetuals Using $VOLT as Collateral: Engage in high-leverage trading of major cryptocurrency pairs and other assets without having to liquidate your holdings.
  • Provide Liquidity: Contribute your $VOLT to liquidity pools on Lynx to earn trading fees and performance rewards from the market’s activity.

A great Milestone for VOLT

The inclusion of $VOLT as collateral on Lynx represents a significant milestone for Voltage Finance and the broader Fuse DeFi ecosystem.

This introduction of $VOLT on Lynx Finance is just the beginning. Our collaboration with Lynx is set to expand further, with plans to list additional Voltage tokens in the near future.

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Voltage Finance Monthly Update — May 2024
items.content_html:
Voltage Finance Monthly Update — May 2024

Past Month’s Dev Updates/Improvements on the DApp

We’ve revamped our Pool and Provide liquidity pages with a sleek new UI and some eye-popping APRs! Dive into our updated pools here.

  • Enhanced app stability ensuring a smoother user experience.
  • Enhanced app stability ensuring a smoother user experience.
  • UI improvements on v3 pools for better usability and navigation.
  • Development of a new landing page, scheduled to go live soon.
  • Resolved a bug affecting slippage calculations on the swap page.
  • Implemented a fix to address and prevent abuse on Voltage tasks.
  • Launched a new FUSE/sFUSE v3 pool, enabling users to trade Fuse for its liquid-staked version and earn trading fees.

Notable Data-Driven Achievements

We’re thrilled to announce a whopping $989K in weekly trading volume and over $3.5M over the month on our v3 pools— two new ATHs for Voltage v3! 🚀
This is a 250% growth from last month’s ATH.

Following the newly introduced Stake $FUSE on Voltage Fuse Network airdrop tasks, we’ve hit a new milestone with sFUSE TVL reaching $550K staked $FUSE🚀

Thanks again to our amazing community! 💚 Stake your FUSE here.

May’s Highlights

New Hires

We’re excited to welcome Isaac (@Idee01 on Telegram) as our new Community Manager! With over four years at Binance and experiences as a Fuse ambassador, Isaac is here to help educate, engage, and grow our community.

We’re also excited to introduce Kuba (@deihen on TG), our new Product Lead at Voltage Finance!⚡️ Kuba has already connected with our community to gather feedback on how we can enhance Voltage.

Please join us in warmly welcoming both to the team!

Voltage Quest on Fuse’s Airdrop & New Validators Opened

Following Fuse’s airdrop campaign, we’ve seen incredible demand for FUSE liquid staking! Our three validators were filled in just under a week, so we opened a new one that also got filled in a week!

sFUSE Listing on Lynx

$sFUSE is now listed as collateral on Lynx Finance, adding a third layer of utility for our Fuse liquid staking token! 🚀

You can now use both tokens to open leveraged trading positions & provide Liquidity. Here is how to deposit on Lynx Finance:
1️⃣ Bridge funds to the Fuse network.
2️⃣ Stake FUSE on Voltage to get $sFUSE.
3️⃣ Deposit $sFUSE or $VOLT on Lynx.

Incentive Program
Join the Fuse x Lynx program and earn rewards from a 15,000 $WFUSE token pool!

New FUSE/sFUSE v3 Pool & MST/sFUSE

Following the opening of their new sFUSE/WFUSE v3 pool, our partners at Meridian migrated their liquidity to a new sFUSE/MST v3 pool, paving the way for other DeFi partners & users to benefit from:

🔹 Better Token Pairing options
🔹 Higher Trading Volume through arbitrage opportunities
🔹 Stable Liquidity

v3 Fee Distribution & Burning

This month’s (ATH) in trading volume had a significant impact on our ecosystem:

  • v3 Fee Burning: 12,455,105 VOLT tokens were burned through transactions on v3 ($1,421 at the current market price). This burning process includes transactions on v2, fUSD, minting/redeeming, and fuse staking.
  • v3 Fee Distribution to LPs: 12,455,105 VOLT tokens ($1,421 at the current market price) were distributed to v3 liquidity providers.
  • Burn Address: You can view the burn address here

Upcoming Things To Look Forward To

Exciting times lie ahead for Voltage Finance with several new token listings on Voltage DEX and enhanced utility for $VOLT.
Don’t forget the ongoing 2M $FUSE airdrop is still live, providing an excellent chance to multiply your airdrop points and rewards by completing simple tasks on Voltage.
Don’t miss out on maximizing your benefits! For more details on how to participate, check out the article here.

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Introducing the new sFUSE-FUSE v3 Pool on Voltage Finance
items.content_html:
Voltage Finance is thrilled to announce the launch of our new sFUSE-FUSE v3 pool to enhance trading both user engagement and liquidity provision. Here’s what this means for our community and partners:

Enhanced Token Pairing Options

Traditionally, projects within the Fuse ecosystem could only pair their tokens with Fuse. With the introduction of the sFUSE-FUSE v3 pool, these projects now have the flexibility to pair with sFuse instead. This shift is expected to yield approximately 15% better price performance annually. An example is Meridian's transitions from its current MST-FUSE pairing to MST-sFUSE. This option extends to other projects on Fuse, offering them a similar opportunity for enhanced market performance.

Growing Trading Volume

The new sFUSE-FUSE v3 pool is designed to be a catalyst for increased trading volumes. As transactions such as purchases and sales of tokens like Meridian’s MST now route through this new pool, we anticipate a significant uptick in activity. Additionally, fluctuations in the FUSE to sFUSE rate may present temporary arbitrage opportunities, further boosting trading volumes and engaging more active participation from traders.

Stable Liquidity provision

For liquidity providers (LPs) seeking stable returns with minimal exposure to risk, the sFUSE-FUSE v3 pool represents an attractive investment. The pool’s structure is designed to offer returns through transaction fees, with added incentives that enhance profitability while safeguarding against market volatility.

Increased Staking TVL and Price Stability

The launch of the sFUSE-FUSE v3 pool encourages more users to stake FUSE to obtain sFUSE, contributing positively to the overall price stability and performance of FUSE.

We invite our community and potential partners to leverage these new opportunities, contributing to and benefiting from the vibrant ecosystem we are building together.

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App

items.title: Introducing the Third Layer of Utility for $sFUSE: Collateral on Lynx Finance
items.content_html:
Lynx Finance has announced the listing of $sFUSE as a collateral asset, marking the third layer of utility for the FUSE liquid staking token. This strategic collaboration not only enhances the utility of $sFUSE but also diversifies its applications, offering unprecedented opportunities for holders and users within the ecosystem.

New Collateral Opportunities with $sFUSE on Lynx

$sFUSE, the liquid staking token of Fuse, already known for allowing holders to commit their tokens to network security while simultaneously utilizing those funds for earning opportunities, now enters a new realm of utility. With the ability to deposit $sFUSE on Lynx Finance, users gain access to leverage trading and liquidity provision, further increasing the token’s functionality and appeal.

How to Leverage $sFUSE on Lynx Finance

For users eager to take advantage of this new feature, the process is straightforward:

  1. Bridge Funds to Fuse: New users to the Fuse ecosystem will need to bridge their existing funds to the Fuse network.
  2. Stake FUSE on Voltage: Utilize Voltage Finance’s staking platform to convert your FUSE tokens into $sFUSE.
  3. Deposit $sFUSE on Lynx: With $sFUSE in your wallet, proceed to Lynx Finance where you can deposit your tokens in the ‘Liquidity’ tab and begin leveraging them as collateral for trading or liquidity provision.

This enhanced functionality opens up several new avenues:

  • Trade Perpetuals Using $sFUSE as Collateral: Engage in high-leverage trading of major cryptocurrency pairs and other assets without having to liquidate your holdings.
  • Provide Liquidity: Contribute your $sFUSE to liquidity pools on Lynx to earn trading fees and performance rewards from the market’s activity.

Fuse Network x Lynx Incentive Program

Fuse and Lynx just partnered for a two-week incentive program starting on May 15, 2024!
This initiative aims to boost $WFUSE trading on Lynx by offering 15,000 $WFUSE tokens as rewards. Active traders can earn these tokens across various trade-to-earn categories, enhancing trading volume and usage of $WFUSE in derivatives trading until May 27, 2024.

A Milestone for Fuse Network’s DeFi Ecosystem

The inclusion of $sFUSE as collateral on Lynx represents a significant milestone for Voltage Finance and the broader Fuse DeFi ecosystem. It is not only a testament to the growing utility and robustness of $sFUSE but also positions the Fuse Network as a competitive player in the global DeFi landscape. Lynx’s integration highlights the versatility of $sFUSE and its ability to provide users with more flexibility and potential for yield generation.

This introduction of $sFUSE on Lynx Finance is just the beginning. Our collaboration with Lynx is set to expand further, with plans to list additional Voltage tokens in the near future.

Stay connected: Telegram | Twitter | Website | VOLT App
